page.title: 06FARMING (CONTINUED)
page.content: {ROUNDSHILL FARM OWNED BY{MR.BOSTOCK.}THE FARM BUILDINGS ARE NOT VERY EXYENSIVE BUT THE LAND COVERS 203 ACRES. THERE ARE 13 FIELDS.THE PRESENT{MR.BOSTOCK}HAS LIVED ON THE FARM FOR 29YRS, HIS FATHER LIVED THERE FOR 45YRS. MACHINERY ON THE FARM IS A COMBINE HARVESTER, TRACTORS AND PLOUGHS. THEY DO A BIT OF CROP ROTATION ON THE FARM CHANGING FROM GRASS TO CORN. THE LIVESTOCK ARE COWS, FREISIANS AND HEREFORDS. THEY ALSO HAVE 3 HENS AND A DOG WHICH IS USED TO HERD THE COWS. THE ONLY SPORT{MR.BOSTOCK}PARTAKES IN IS SHOOTING. HE SHOOTS PIGEONS AND RABBITS WHICH HE CONSIDERS TO BE VERMIN.HE DOES NOT SHOOT FOXES AS THEY HELP TO KILL OFF THE RABBITS.MYXOMATOSIS ALSO KILLS THE RABBITS.
